projects.description: List of projects associated with this client.

id.description: Unique identifier assigned to the client.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the client was created.

lineItemMask.description: Mask representing the client's line item format.

paymentDueDays.description: Number of days before payment is due for this client.

businessDetails.description: Details related to the client's business.

invoicePublicNotes.description: Public notes to be included in the client's invoice.

excludedLabels.description: List of labels that are excluded for this client.

enableResourcePlanner.description: Flag to enable or disable resource planner for the client.

favorite.description: Flag indicating if the client is marked as a favorite.
